```py
>>> d = {'num_legs': [4, 4, 2, 2],
...      'num_wings': [0, 0, 2, 2],
...      'class': ['mammal', 'mammal', 'mammal', 'bird'],
...      'animal': ['cat', 'dog', 'bat', 'penguin'],
...      'locomotion': ['walks', 'walks', 'flies', 'walks']}
>>> df = pd.DataFrame(data=d)
>>> df = df.set_index(['class', 'animal', 'locomotion'])
>>> df
 num_legs  num_wings
class  animal  locomotion
mammal cat     walks              4          0
 dog     walks              4          0
 bat     flies              2          2
bird   penguin walks              2          2 
```

```py
>>> df.xs('mammal')
 num_legs  num_wings
animal locomotion
cat    walks              4          0
dog    walks              4          0
bat    flies              2          2 
```

```py
>>> df.xs(('mammal', 'dog', 'walks'))
num_legs     4
num_wings    0
Name: (mammal, dog, walks), dtype: int64 
```

```py
>>> df.xs('cat', level=1)
 num_legs  num_wings
class  locomotion
mammal walks              4          0 
```

```py
>>> df.xs(('bird', 'walks'),
...       level=[0, 'locomotion'])
 num_legs  num_wings
animal
penguin         2          2 
```

```py
>>> df.xs('num_wings', axis=1)
class   animal   locomotion
mammal  cat      walks         0
 dog      walks         0
 bat      flies         2
bird    penguin  walks         2
Name: num_wings, dtype: int64 
```
